title: 60 Glennon Doyle Melton: Overcoming Addictions and Courageous Vulnerablility
description:
Glennon Doyle Melton of Momestary opens up with courageous vulnerability.
The most personal fact is always the most universal
She shares how she overcame addiction, maintains amazing relationships and gets deep with people in ways that simply intimidate many people.
It's a powerful episode so make sure to listen to the very end.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
